TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 控件中的项时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 当 控件中的项绑定到数据源时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is bound to a data source. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以显示 控件中的项的创建顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which the items in the control are created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/CS/datagriditemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/VB/datagriditemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 当通过调用此构造函数创建 实例时，以下属性将初始化为指定值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value. |ItemItem|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |ItemItem|`item` 参数。The `item` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. span.span: The referenced item in the control when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当引发事件时，使用此属性以编程方式访问 控件中引用的项。Use this property to programmatically access the item referenced in the control when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性显示 控件中的项的创建顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the order in which the items in the control are created.
